message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you a decent amount to keep you in the game.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going easy on you yet.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not getting taken advantage of. Meet me in the middle?
I'll give you a bit more, but I think I'm still getting the better end of the deal.
I'm getting a bit impatient, Bob. I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I need a better deal now.
I'm not getting desperate yet, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Don't think this is the best you'll get, though.
Time's running out, Bob. I'm getting close to walking away. Meet me at this price or we're done.
I'm not going to give in yet. You're getting desperate, and I'm getting a better deal.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not making another move.
I'm not going to settle for this. I think I can get a better deal if I wait.
This is my last serious offer, Bob. I'm not going to make another move. Take it or walk away.
I'm not going to accept anything less than a 50/50 split. I'm walking away.
